q: : US House votes to scrap Guantanamo closure Related Story: Guantanamo has ''too many secrets' to be closed The ''war on terror''' prison at the US naval base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba is one of the finest prison systems in the world, former defence secretary Donald Rumsfeld said in an interview with Fox News. Mr Donald Rumsfeld , who is promoting his autobiography titled Known And Unknown, also praised US military personnel working at the site. Mr

''We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it.'' Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. In his U.N. presentation, Colin Powell described it as Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal. Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Abu Musab al-Zarqawi , a Jordanian extremist with ties to the al-Qaida terrorist network. Ben Roethlisberger will beat you up. I've never seen a guy take the hits he can take and also make people miss the way he doe and be as accurate on the run. booming mobile telephone market with its Android mobile operating system. ''Facebook is the world's biggest social network and Google is not going to come up with another social network,'' he said. But they already have a massive social presence. ''YouTube is the third-biggest website in the world and massively social... Email is still the primary social communication media and Google is the fastest growing email provider in the world. ''And they've got the largest blogging platform in the world so they are already a massive player in social, he added. In a conference call with financial analysts after the surprise announcement that Page would replace Eric Schmidt in April, co-founder Sergey Brin indicated the company would be putting more effort into the social arena.
